name: Lofi Beats To Infinitely Run To
name_original: Lofi Beats To Infinitely Run To
description:
Lofi Beats To Infinitely Run To is a really simple infinite runner I made in around three days for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1. The theme was "This Is Not Real" so I decided to base this game on an experience I, like many others, had as a kid - you're on a long car ride and pretending that someone is running along the side, jumping over various things.

NOTE: If the music isn't playing, press esc and reload the game. GameMaker 2's web exporting is kinda cruddy!
